message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.SOC, cs.CYBER, cs.IR 

The paper focuses on constructing and analyzing social interaction networks using social media data, which falls under the category of social networks (cs.SI) and social media (cs.SD). The paper also discusses the growth and characteristics of such networks, which can be categorized under the subfield of network science (cs.SOC). The application of such networks as a tool for disseminating targeted information during planned special events also falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
